decision_conditions: <div><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">Overall, the proposed rear dormer window,&nbsp;by reason of its mass,&nbsp;design and sitting,&nbsp;in an area where the&nbsp;majority of houses within the street scene have not extended, particularly at roof level, would&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 11pt;">ruin the uniformity across the estate which would set a new precedent throughout the surrounding area, contributing to the overdevelopment of properties which contradicts the reasoning for the removal of permitted development rights in the original decision notice.
